QueryText: WANT TO KNOW ABOUT KISAN CREDIT CARD
KCCAns: CONTACT WITH LOCAL A.D.A.

QueryText: Asking about kisan credit card and chirkey furkey disease of cardamom?
KCCAns: Recommended to contact with the local block office/ADA office and spray  1%Bordeaux mixture for control of chirkey furkey disease of cardamom

QueryText: Asking about Leaf spot in ginger?
KCCAns: Recommended for spray of 1 % Bordeaux mixture or Copper oxychloride 0.25% and seed treatment of rhizome with Mancozeb @ 3gm/lit of water.

QueryText: Asking about shoot borer in mandarine and cultivation of lettuce?
KCCAns:
Recommended for spray of ORRANGE- (Monocrotophos 36 WSC @ 1 ml/lit or Quinalphos 25 EC @ 1.5 ml/lit or Carbaryl 50 WP @  4 g/lit.) and for LETTUCE- Seed treatment with 
Trichoderma viride @ (4 g/kg of seed), also Apply Neem oil(azadirectin) @ 3ml/lit of water at the later stage for controll of insects/pest

QueryText: CONTROL OF FRUIT FLY  IN BITTER GOURD
KCCAns: RECOMMENDED FOR SPRAY AZADIRACTIN 1% (10000 PPM) @ 3 ML / LIT OF WATER.

QueryText: CONTROL OF WHITE FLY IN CHILLIE
KCCAns: RECOMMENDED FOR SPRAY IMIDACLOPRID 17.8% SL  @  1 ML / 5 LIT OF WATER.

QueryText: CONTROL OF BRWON PLANT HOPPER IN PADDY
KCCAns: RECOMMENDED FOR SPRAY BUPROFEZIN 25% SC @ 1 ML  / LIT OF WATER.

QueryText: CONTROL OF FLOWER DROPPING IN CITRUS
KCCAns: RECOMMENDED FOR  SPRAY ALPHA NAPTHALENE ACETIC ACID @ 1 ML/4.5 LT. OF WATER

QueryText: CONTROL OF RHIZOME ROT/SOFT ROT IN GINGER.
KCCAns: RECOMMENDED FOR APPLY TRICHODERMMA HARZARIUM@5GRAM ALONG WITH NEEM CAKE @1KG PER BED.

QueryText: ASKING ABOUT SOFT ROT IN GINGER?
KCCAns: Recommended for Treating the seed rhizomes with Mancozeb or Copper oxychloride 3 g/lit or 200 ppmStreptocycline for 30 minutes and Application of Trichoderma harzionum along with neem cake @ 1kg/bed helps in preventing cutworm

QueryText: WANT TO KNOWN ABOUT CONTROL OF MEALY BUG IN GUAVA.
KCCAns: RECOMMENDED FOR SPRAY  CHLORPYRIPHOS 20% EC @ 2.5 ML  / LIT OF WATER.

QueryText: MICRONUTRIENT MIXTURE DOSE
KCCAns: RECOMMENDED DOSE FOR SPRAYING MICRONUTRIENT MIXTURE @ 2GM/L OF WATER

QueryText: ASKING ABOUT SEED TREATMENT IN CORIANDER.
KCCAns: RECOMMENDED FOR APPLY CARBENDAZIM 50% WP @ 2 GM / LIT OF WATER.

QueryText: CONTROL OF LEAF SPOT IN BAY LEAF.

QueryText: ASKING ABOUT SOIL TESTING LABOUTARY CENTRE IN KALIMPONG.

QueryText: CONTROL OF LATE BLIGHT IN POTATO
